metadata.title: CVE-2019-12107 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: The upnp_event_prepare function in upnpevents.c in MiniUPnP MiniUPnPdthrough 2.1 allows a remote attacker to leak information from the heap dueto improper validation of an snprintf return value.

criterions.comment: miniupnpd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
